description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. You have one cannonball left. The enemy is too far away to hit.... but don't fret. Bounce the ball off of landmines and fallen foes to get more distance. Watch out for birds and sand traps though. Go the distance and get the high score. Play with up to 4 players on one controller.
